text: Geza Tatrallyay (born 11 February 1949) is a Canadian fencer and author. He competed in the individual and team épée events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. Tatrallyay was born in Budapest, Hungary in 1949 and escaped with his family in 1956, emigrating to Canada. He graduated from Harvard University, Oxford University, and London School of Economics.https://www.huffpost.com/author/geza-tatrallyay ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Canada Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Budapest Category:Hungarian emigrants to Canada Category:Harvard Crimson fencers Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:Alumni of the London School of Economics
title: Geza Tatrallyay
